typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movies as (genres as string[], movieid as string, rating as string, title as string, year as string)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['moviesjson.parquet'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
